hero.title: Projects & Events
hero.subtitle: Meaningful initiatives that bring generations together
hero.description: Explore our ongoing projects and upcoming events designed to foster intergenerational connection and community impact.

featuredProjects.title: Wisdom Keepers Archive
featuredProjects.description: A digital storytelling project preserving the life stories and wisdom of community elders through video interviews conducted by young volunteers.

featuredProjects.title: Intergenerational Skill Swap
featuredProjects.description: Monthly workshops where different generations teach each other valuable skills - from technology to traditional crafts.

featuredProjects.title: Community Memory Garden
featuredProjects.description: A collaborative garden project where each plant represents a shared memory or story from community members of all ages.
featuredProjects.impact: Beautiful community space created, 80+ families involved

upcomingEvents.title: Spring Intergenerational Festival
upcomingEvents.description: A day-long celebration featuring performances, workshops, food, and activities for all ages.

upcomingEvents.title: Digital Storytelling Workshop
upcomingEvents.description: Learn to create compelling digital stories with guidance from experienced storytellers.

upcomingEvents.title: Recipe Exchange & Cooking Class
upcomingEvents.description: Share family recipes and cooking techniques across generations while preparing a meal together.

pastEvents.title: Holiday Traditions Sharing
pastEvents.description: Community members shared holiday traditions from different cultures and generations.

pastEvents.title: Technology Mentoring Day
pastEvents.description: Young volunteers helped seniors navigate smartphones, social media, and digital tools.

pastEvents.title: Oral History Workshop
pastEvents.description: Training session for community members to conduct and preserve oral history interviews.
